listing_company_name: RE/MAX Regency - Gold Coast & Scenic Rim
description:
Perfectly positioned in one of the most desirable cul-de-sacs streets, in the beautiful leafy and nature-filled suburb of Worongary, is this expansive and impressive family home, offering nothing short of an idyllic and complete acreage lifestyle, where the whole family will be truly at home.

Poised on an expansive and private block, elevated to capture the cooling breezes and lush Hinterland vistas, private and serene, you can easily be forgiven for forgetting that you are also so convenient to all of the many facilities this booming area has to offer - the best of both worlds is right here....

This home offers a certain warmth and there is a palpable feel that a family has been raised here in a loving and caring environment, however, the birds have flown the nest and it is time to move on......

An expansive floorplan offers plenty of space for the whole clan, with open plan living spaces on the lower level, including a formal lounge and dining, plus a casual meals area and family space in which to relax.
The gorgeous, raked ceilings offer a timeless elegance and blend beautifully with the contemporary polished floor tiles and the wood burner stove offers warmth to the whole home during the cooler months.
There are four generous bedrooms, with plenty of storage on the lower level (currently one is an office), and they are serviced by two modern, well-appointed bathrooms.

The upper level is dedicated to a sumptuous master suite, which is a true sanctuary from the rest of the house and those who live in it! A modern ensuite complete with a spa bath to soak in after a stressful day, is fit for royalty and the walk-in robe provides lots of clothes storage. Glass sliding doors reveal an elevated veranda and it is simply an exquisite place for a morning coffee, as you ease into your day, listening to the wondrous birdsong, as day breaks in this stunning part of the world.

The centrally located kitchen is at the heart of the home and is bright, modern and airy, with quality fixtures, fittings and plenty of storage space.

Outside, the beautiful, spacious covered alfresco area is perched perfectly to take in vistas of the lush sloping lawns and the peaks of the Hinterland beyond. Space is aplenty and there has been many fun evenings here, eating drinking and making merry. In fact, this home has hosted two weddings of the owner’s children, when life long memories with friends and family were made in this picturesque environment.

Parking is plentiful and if the double garage is not space enough, then the 9m x 6m shed, is perfect storage for your toys, or an ideal workshop for tradespeople - it's currently used as a games room/bar area!

This home truly offers the complete package, with just about every box ticked. If you want the complete package, then please put this one right at the top of your list!


Some of the many features include -

*7747m2 of lush, fenced land, in a whisper quiet and highly desirable cul-de-sac street, elevated with a beautiful Hinterland aspect
*An impeccably presented, warm and character filled family home
*Separate master level, generous in size and beautifully finished, with a modern, well-appointed ensuite bathroom with spa bath, large walk-in robe and a private deck, perfect for morning coffees
*4 generous bedrooms (or 3 plus office) on ground floor
*2 further modern bathrooms on lower level, well-appointed with floor to ceiling tiles and one with a bathtub
*Abundant open plan living space, with beautiful polished tile flooring throughout - dining/lounge plus a casual dining area and family room
*a stunning wooden panelled cathedral ceiling offering undeniable charm and a beautiful airy ambience
*a modern, well-equipped kitchen with quality appliances and plenty of storage/pantry space
*Expansive veranda space for entertaining under and a fantastic elevated alfresco deck, just perfect to entertain on any occasion, no matter how big or small - this home has even hosted weddings!!!
*Sparkling in ground pool, surrounded by beautifully landscape tropical gardens
*Auto double garage
*Ducted air con on lower level and split system in the master suite
*Wood burner fireplace for those cool Hinterland mornings
*Ceiling fans
*9m x 6m shed with storage annexe
*Fruit trees plus veggie gardens
*Solar power (25 panels) plus solar hot water
*Water tank
*Minutes to some of the best schools Queensland has to offer

Hugh Guinea Court is undoubtedly one of the premier streets in the family friendly and leafy suburb of Worongary.

Located just minutes from the Pacific Motorway and an easy commute to the Brisbane CBD and International airport. To the south, the NSW border is within easy reach, passing the Gold Coast International and domestic airports.

The thriving Robina Town Centre is on your doorstep and provides all the facilities you could possibly require.

With Queensland's finest schools, beaches, shops, transport and medical facilities on the doorstep, it is the location that has it all!
